3684.verse: إِنَّآ|Indeed, We|96|122|120$أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ|[We] have sent you|153|204|1101$بِٱلْحَقِّ|with the truth,|118|169|692$بَشِيرًا|(as) a bearer of glad tidings|205|230|1102$وَنَذِيرًاۚ|and (as) a warner.|144|157|1103$وَإِن|And not|72|97|213$مِّنْ|(was) any|87|112|53$أُمَّةٍ|nation|61|86|3159$إِلَّا|but|42|67|86$خَلَا|had passed|95|120|735$فِيهَا|within it|73|86|253$نَذِيرٌ|a warner.|83|83|7060$

3685.verse: وَإِن|And if|58|70|213$يُكَذِّبُوكَ|they deny you,|121|145|12121$فَقَدْ|then certainly,|117|141|1016$كَذَّبَ|denied|67|91|5487$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|113|20$مِن قَبْلِهِمْ|(were) before them.|154|166|1094$جَآءَتْهُمْ|Came to them|113|122|4930$رُسُلُهُم|their Messengers|132|149|6645$بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ|with clear signs|123|140|880$وَبِٱلزُّبُرِ|and with Scriptures|149|166|14381$وَبِٱلْكِتَـٰبِ|and with the Book|140|148|14382$ٱلْمُنِيرِ|[the] enlightening.|143|143|3577$

3687.verse: أَلَمْ|Do not|64|78|348$تَرَ|you see|72|100|2301$أَنَّ|that|48|76|240$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|81|184$أَنزَلَ|sends down|98|126|2043$مِنَ|from|50|78|156$ٱلسَّمَآءِ|the sky|84|112|157$مَآءً|water,|63|77|202$فَأَخْرَجْنَا|then We bring forth|150|163|5876$بِهِۦ|therewith|83|109|204$ثَمَرَٲتٍ|fruits|87|113|14384$مُّخْتَلِفًا|(of) various|97|123|6106$أَلْوَٲنُهَاۚ|[their] colors?|113|139|14385$وَمِنَ|And in|64|77|74$ٱلْجِبَالِ|the mountains|114|129|9835$جُدَدُۢ|(are) tracts,|103|133|14386$بِيضٌ|white|71|101|14387$وَحُمْرٌ|and red|80|110|14388$مُّخْتَلِفٌ|(of) various|97|127|10041$أَلْوَٲنُهَا|[their] colors,|111|126|14385$وَغَرَابِيبُ سُودٌ|and intensely black.|164|164|14389$

3688.verse: وَمِنَ|And among|93|100|74$ٱلنَّاسِ|men|75|89|75$وَٱلدَّوَآبِّ|and moving creatures|163|177|14390$وَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ|and the cattle|115|129|2679$مُخْتَلِفٌ|(are) various|105|119|10041$أَلْوَٲنُهُۥ|[their] colors|106|113|9906$كَذَٲلِكَۗ|likewise.|77|86|702$إِنَّمَا|Only|55|73|102$يَخْشَى|fear|81|99|11338$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|71|184$مِنْ|among|63|81|53$عِبَادِهِ|His slaves|85|103|868$ٱلْعُلَمَـٰٓؤُاْۗ|those who have knowledge.|205|214|14391$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|124|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|160|184$عَزِيزٌ|(is) All-Mighty,|118|225|1827$غَفُورٌ|Oft-Forgiving.|112|166|1499$

3689.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|80|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|109|20$يَتْلُونَ|recite|74|94|1051$كِتَـٰبَ|(the) Book|90|110|14392$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah,|86|106|606$وَأَقَامُواْ|and establish|107|127|2490$ٱلصَّلَوٲةَ|the prayer|91|101|38$وَأَنفَقُواْ|and spend|88|98|3999$مِمَّا|out of what|98|117|216$رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ|We have provided them,|182|201|40$سِرًّا|secretly|73|92|2100$وَعَلَانِيَةً|and openly,|97|116|2468$يَرْجُونَ|hope|92|102|1912$تِجَـٰرَةً|(for) a commerce -|147|239|2555$لَّن|never|57|241|524$تَبُورَ|it will perish.|103|195|14393$

3679.verse: Not equal are the blind and the seeing,

3680.verse: Nor are the darknesses and the light,

3681.verse: Nor are the shade and the heat,

3682.verse: And not equal are the living and the dead. Indeed, Allah causes to hear whom He wills, but you cannot make hear those in the graves.

3683.verse: You, [O Muhammad], are not but a warner.

3684.verse: Indeed, We have sent you with the truth as a bringer of good tidings and a warner. And there was no nation but that there had passed within it a warner.

3685.verse: And if they deny you - then already have those before them denied. Their messengers came to them with clear proofs and written ordinances and with the enlightening Scripture.

3686.verse: Then I seized the ones who disbelieved, and how [terrible] was My reproach.

3687.verse: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky, and We produce thereby fruits of varying colors? And in the mountains are tracts, white and red of varying shades and [some] extremely black.

3688.verse: And among people and moving creatures and grazing livestock are various colors similarly. Only those fear Allah, from among His servants, who have knowledge. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Forgiving.

3689.verse: Indeed, those who recite the Book of Allah and establish prayer and spend [in His cause] out of what We have provided them, secretly and publicly, [can] expect a profit that will never perish -

3690.verse: That He may give them in full their rewards and increase for them of His bounty. Indeed, He is Forgiving and Appreciative.
